catalog_info.title: Introduction to WGS: Graduate Proseminar
catalog_info.notes: Will count as the Graduate Proseminar for the PhD secondary field requirement in WGS.
catalog_info.description: A multidisciplinary introduction to graduate studies in Women, Gender, and Sexuality Studies. Students build detailed maps of the intersections between their (inter)disciplines and WGS Studies. The course prepares students to understand that terrain and to traverse it as professionals. Students produce documents of direct practical value, including a syllabus and a comprehensive exam list.
